revision.text: Possibly: A sacrament catechism, or, a catechism preparatory to the receiving of the sacrament of the Lords' Supper. ... = Sacrament gatechism, neu gatechism i barattoi rhai i dderb≈∑n Sacrament Swpper yr Arglwydd. ... By R.R.A.M. and Vicar of the said parish of Chirk. (By Robert Roberts). ([Chester?] : Printed for the author, 1720). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/191697487
